titles.title: Business and Taxpayer Procurement Protection Act
A bill to limit the period for which the Federal Government may procure property or services using noncompetitive procedures during emergency and urgent situations.
Business and Taxpayer Procurement Protection Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Business and Taxpayer Procurement Protection Act - Limits any period of Government procurement of property or services using noncompetitive procedures in certain emergency and urgent situations to 90 days. Requires any such procurements that are to be required beyond 90 days to: (1) be subject to full and open competition during such 90-day period; and (2) use competitive procedures.
